Name: Hard Life
About the game: Surviving while reaching at the point A mode where you try to go to the farthest point of the map by surviving. Levels We have added some sections so that the game has a purpose for now. You can access them by pressing the 'Play' button. It is not very useful as the save system is not complete in the Sandox option, but we will fix it as soon as possible. Game Mechanics There are mechanics in the game such as building, crafting, chilling, collecting materials, speeding up time. This game is a survival game. Even though there are zombies in the game, the biggest challenge is the cold-temperature balance. The SandBox mod of the game is under construction. Apart from that, there are 3 different sections. The goal is to reach the farthest corner of the map.
